    [Image] or [Truncated image[            Bcol      Ecol
L1
    [Given]                                 1         6
    [I]                                     7         8
    [have]                                  9         13
    [a]                                     14        15
    [lot]                                   16        19
    [to]                                    20        22
    [say:]                                  23        27
    [\n]                                    27        28
L2
    ["""\n One\n Two\n Three\n """]         1         5
L6
    [\n]                                    5         6
EOF
